summary: Looksmaxxing-focused selfie app where users submit selfies to receive a current rating and potential rating (with explanations) plus age-appropriate home workout suggestions (e.g., for ages 13+).
architectural_notes: Workouts content should be tailored for at-home routines and age-appropriate guidance for users 13+ (exercise selection, intensity, and safety cues).
known_issues: Device camera is not usable in the selfie flow (camera capture unavailable/non-functional).
The 'current rating' output is not working while 'potential rating' does work.
imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Update the existing app icon to a looksmaxxing aesthetic with a modern, high-contrast, fitness/self-improvement vibe using warm/neutral tones (app-icon.dim_512x512.png > app-icon.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity sign-in and require authentication before a user can create/view their selfie ratings and workout plan.
Add a 'Selfie' flow that lets a signed-in user capture or upload a selfie image (via device camera when available, otherwise file upload), preview it, and submit it for scoring.

Implement a deterministic, explainable scoring system that produces (1) a current 'rating' and (2) a 'potential rating' from the selfie submission, without using third-party AI/LLM services. Show an explanation of how each score was derived.
Add a 'History' view where a user can browse their past selfie entries, open a detail view, and see the selfie image/thumbnail, rating, potential rating, and the score explanation.

Add an in-app 'Workouts' experience that provides workout routines and recommendations. Recommendations must be derived from in-app inputs (e.g., selected goals, equipment availability, weekly frequency) and/or the selfie score results, and must not require external services.

Create a consistent, distinctive visual theme for the app (colors, typography, spacing, component styling) suitable for a fitness/self-improvement product, and apply it across all screens. Do not use a blue/purple primary palette.
Generate and add required static images to the frontend and render them in the UI where appropriate (e.g., app icon and empty states), storing them under frontend/public/assets/generated.

Update the frontend score display to robustly handle and present the fixed current rating (including any existing sessions that may still have old/edge-case values) without crashing or showing NaN/undefined, and ensure the "Current Rating" visibly updates after submission.

Make the selfie flow usable when device camera capture is unavailable by providing an upload-first experience and a clear fallback path: if camera is unsupported or errors/permission is denied, hide/disable camera capture and guide the user to upload a photo instead (while still keeping camera capture available when it actually works).

Rebrand the appâ€™s user-facing name and copy to match a looksmaxxing positioning by replacing "Rate & Elevate" and related generic fitness taglines across the main entry screen and the app header with a looksmaxxing-themed app name and description (English text).

Adjust the Workouts experience to focus on age-appropriate home workouts for teens (13+) by updating the workouts copy and workout plan generator content to be teen-safe, home-friendly (bodyweight/minimal equipment), and explicitly framed for ages 13 and older.

new_feature_requests.summary: Provide a rating based on the user's selfie
Provide a separate 'potential rating' for the user based on the selfie

Create backend storage for selfie sessions per user, including image bytes (or a stored thumbnail), timestamp, and computed results: 'rating' and 'potential rating'. Only the owner can list/read their entries.
Rebrand/rename the app to better match a 'looksmaxxing' positioning
Adjust workouts to focus on home workouts appropriate for teens (13+)

Fix the selfie scoring so the returned "current rating" is computed correctly (not always 0) while keeping the existing deterministic/explainable scoring approach and the existing API shape (CrossRealityScore with rating, potentialRating, details).

projectName: Selfie rating and workout recommendation app
